(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (JJS latest) (NN culinary) (NN trend))
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP
          (NP (NN town))
          (CC and)
          (RB indeed) (IN around)
          (NP (DT the) (NN world)))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB undoubtedly))
      (NP (JJ Spanish) (NN cuisine)))
    (. .)))


det(trend-4, The-1)
amod(trend-4, latest-2)
nn(trend-4, culinary-3)
nsubj(cuisine-15, trend-4)
prep(trend-4, in-5)
pobj(in-5, town-6)
cc(town-6, and-7)
advmod(town-6, indeed-8)
amod(town-6, around-9)
det(world-11, the-10)
dep(town-6, world-11)
cop(cuisine-15, is-12)
advmod(cuisine-15, undoubtedly-13)
amod(cuisine-15, Spanish-14)
root(ROOT-0, cuisine-15)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN In)
      (NP (DT the) (JJ last) (JJ few) (NNS years)))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, In-1)
det(years-5, the-2)
amod(years-5, last-3)
amod(years-5, few-4)
pobj(In-1, years-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ its)
      (ADJP (JJ refreshing)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB see)
              (NP (JJ many) (JJ Spanish) (NNS eateries))))))
      (NN opening))
    (VP
      (ADVP
        (ADVP (RB up) (RB here))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP (DT a) (NN market))))
      (VBN saturated)
      (PP (IN with)
        (NP (JJ Italian) (NNS eateries))))
    (. .)))


poss(opening-8, its-1)
amod(opening-8, refreshing-2)
aux(see-4, to-3)
xcomp(refreshing-2, see-4)
amod(eateries-7, many-5)
amod(eateries-7, Spanish-6)
dobj(see-4, eateries-7)
nsubj(saturated-14, opening-8)
advmod(here-10, up-9)
advmod(saturated-14, here-10)
prep(here-10, in-11)
det(market-13, a-12)
pobj(in-11, market-13)
root(ROOT-0, saturated-14)
prep(saturated-14, with-15)
amod(eateries-17, Italian-16)
pobj(with-15, eateries-17)

            (VB venture)
            (PP
              (PP (IN into)
                (NP (JJ Spanish) (NN cuisine)))
              (CC but)
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP (DT this) (NN post)))
              (, ,))))))))

  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB now))
      (ADJP (JJ official))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBP am)
            (PP (IN on)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NN hunt))
                (PP (IN for)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT the) (JJS best) (JJ Spanish) (NN food))
                    (PP (IN in)
                      (NP (NNP Singapore)))))))))))
    (. !)))

  (S
    (NP (NNP Bomba))
    (VP
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (NP
          (NP (CD one))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (JJS latest) (JJ Spanish) (NNS restaurants)))
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (NN town)))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBZ takes)
        (PP (IN over)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN location))
            (PP (IN from)
              (NP (NNP Graze)))))
        (PP (IN at)
          (NP (CD 38) (NNP Martin) (NN Place)))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (NN food))
      (PP (IN at)
        (NP (NNP Bomba))))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (ADJP (RB so) (JJ impressive)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (VBP am)
              (VP (VBN left)
                (S
                  (VP (VBG wondering)

                      (WHADVP (WRB why))
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP it))
                        (VP (VBZ has)
                          (VP (VBN taken)
                            (NP (PRP me)))))))))))))
      (X
        (ADVP (RB so) (JJ long)

            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB get)

    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (DT These) (NNS shrimps))
      (VP (VBP are)
        (VP (VBN found)
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (JJ brackish) (NNS waters)))
          (PP (IN at)
            (NP (DT the) (NNS estuaries)))
          (SBAR (IN before)
            (S
              (NP (DT the) (NN river))
              (VP (VBZ empties)
                (PP (IN into)
                  (NP (DT the) (NN ocean)))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (JJ natural) (NN color))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT the) (NN shrimp))))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADJP (JJ due)
          (PP (TO to)
            (NP (DT the) (NN plankton))))
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (DT the) (NN shrimp))
            (VP (VBZ feeds)
              (PRT (RP on)))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (JJ briny) (NN crustacean) (NN flavor))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (RB so) (JJ strong))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBD made)
            (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS fingers) (NN smell))
            (PP (IN like)
              (NP (NN keropok)))
            (PP (IN for)
              (NP (PDT quite) (DT a) (NN while)))))))
    (. !)))


det(flavor-4, The-1)
amod(flavor-4, briny-2)
nn(flavor-4, crustacean-3)
nsubj(strong-7, flavor-4)
cop(strong-7, is-5)
advmod(strong-7, so-6)
root(ROOT-0, strong-7)
mark(made-10, that-8)
nsubj(made-10, it-9)
ccomp(strong-7, made-10)
poss(smell-13, my-11)
nn(smell-13, fingers-12)
dobj(made-10, smell-13)
prep(made-10, like-14)
pobj(like-14, keropok-15)
prep(made-10, for-16)
predet(while-19, quite-17)
det(while-19, a-18)
pobj(for-16, while-19)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NN head))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (DT the) (NN shrimp))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (JJ full)
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (JJ yummy) (NN tomally))
            (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
              (NP (NN liver))
              (-RRB- -RRB-))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WDT which))
              (S
                (VP (MD would)
                  (VP (VB have)
                    (VP (VBN gone)
                      (ADVP (RB so) (RB well))
                      (PP (IN in)
                        (NP (DT a) (NN paella))))))))))))
    (. !)))

nsubj(full-7, head-2)
prep(head-2, of-3)

aux(gone-17, would-15)

prep(gone-17, in-20)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP
        (NP (CD 22))
        (NP (DT each)))
      (CC or)
      (NP (PRP I)))
    (VP (MD could)
      (VP (VB be)
        (ADJP (RB quite) (JJ happy))
        (S
          (ADVP (RB just))
          (VP (VBG ordering)
            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (NN plateful))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (DT these))))
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB enjoy)
                  (PP (IN with)
                    (NP (DT some) (NN beer))))))))))
    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ Spanish) (NN food) (NN expert))
    (VP (VBZ tells)
      (NP (PRP me))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (DT these))
          (VP (VBP are)
            (ADVP (RB also))
            (ADJP (JJ expensive)
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP
                  (NP (NNP Spain))
                  (SBAR
                    (WHADVP (WRB where))
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP they))
                      (VP (MD can)
                        (VP (VB fetch)
                          (NP
                            (NP (CD 60) (NNS euros))
                            (PP (IN per)
                              (NP (NN kg)))))))))))))))
    (. !)))

  (S
    (NP (NNP Secreto) (NNP Iberico))

    (VP
      (VP (VBZ means)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (`` ``) (JJ Secret))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (NNP Iberico)))))
      ('' '')
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBZ refers)
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN area))
              (PP (RB just) (IN between)
                (NP (DT the) (NN foreleg))))
            (CC and)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN belly))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (DT the) (NN pig))))))))
    (. .)))

    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (JJ traditional) (NN dish))
      (PP (IN of)

          (NP (NN pulpo) (NN ala) (NN gallega))
          (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
            (NP (NN Galician) (NN style) (NNS octopus))
            (-RRB- -RRB-)))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT a)
        (ADJP (RB very) (JJ simple))
        (NN dish)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB make))))))
    (. .)))

  (S (IN So)
    (NP (DT the) (NN waiting) (NN time))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (PP (IN between)
        (NP
          (NP (JJ 20-25mins))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WDT which))
            (S
              (VP (VBZ is)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NN amount))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (NN time)))
                  (SBAR
                    (S
                      (NP (DT the) (NN rice))
                      (VP (VBZ needs)
                        (S
                          (VP (TO to)
                            (VP (VB cook))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

prep(excited-5, about-6)
pcomp(about-6, discovering-7)
dobj(discovering-7, more-8)
prep(discovering-7, about-9)
amod(cuisine-11, Spanish-10)
pobj(about-9, cuisine-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP guess)
      (NP
        (NP (DT that) (NN sort))
        (PP (IN of)
          (S
            (VP (VBG sums)
              (NP (PRP it))
              (PRT (RP up)))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(guess-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, guess-2)
det(sort-4, that-3)
dobj(guess-2, sort-4)
prep(sort-4, of-5)
pcomp(of-5, sums-6)
dobj(sums-6, it-7)
prt(sums-6, up-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP
      (VP (VB Dine)
        (PP (IN between)
          (NP (CD 6pm) (TO to) (CD 8pm))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VB get)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (JJ free) (NN dessert))
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP (DT every) (CD two) (NNS diners))))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Dine-1)
prep(Dine-1, between-2)
num(8pm-5, 6pm-3)
dep(8pm-5, to-4)
pobj(between-2, 8pm-5)
cc(Dine-1, and-6)
conj(Dine-1, get-7)
det(dessert-10, a-8)
amod(dessert-10, free-9)
dobj(get-7, dessert-10)
prep(dessert-10, for-11)
det(diners-14, every-12)
num(diners-14, two-13)
pobj(for-11, diners-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Make)
      (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS reservations))
      (PP (IN under)
        (NP (NN ieatishootipost)))
      (SBAR (IN in) (NN order)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB enjoy)
              (NP (DT this) (NN offer)))))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Make-1)
poss(reservations-3, your-2)
dobj(Make-1, reservations-3)
prep(Make-1, under-4)
pobj(under-4, ieatishootipost-5)
mark(enjoy-9, in-6)
dep(enjoy-9, order-7)
aux(enjoy-9, to-8)
advcl(Make-1, enjoy-9)
det(offer-11, this-10)
dobj(enjoy-9, offer-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VBN Valid)
      (PP (IN till)
        (NP
          (NP (NN end))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (NNP November))))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Valid-1)
prep(Valid-1, till-2)
pobj(till-2, end-3)
prep(end-3, of-4)
pobj(of-4, November-5)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NNP Bomba) (CD 38))
    (NP
      (NP (NNP Martin) (NNP Road) (NNP Singapore) (CD 239059)
        (ADJP
          (QP (CD 6509) (CD 1680)))
        (NNS 6pm))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (JJ 12mn) (NNP Closed) (NNP Sundays))))))


root(ROOT-0, Bomba-1)
num(Bomba-1, 38-2)
nn(6pm-9, Martin-3)
nn(6pm-9, Road-4)
nn(6pm-9, Singapore-5)
num(6pm-9, 239059-6)
number(1680-8, 6509-7)
num(6pm-9, 1680-8)
dep(Bomba-1, 6pm-9)
prep(6pm-9, to-10)
amod(Sundays-13, 12mn-11)
nn(Sundays-13, Closed-12)
pobj(to-10, Sundays-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NNS media))
        (VP (VBN invited)
          (NP (NN review)))))))


nsubj(media-4, This-1)
cop(media-4, was-2)
det(media-4, a-3)
root(ROOT-0, media-4)
partmod(media-4, invited-5)
dobj(invited-5, review-6)
